event.name: Event Promotion
event.title: Prompt Generator – Event
event.description: Fill out the fields below to generate your event promotion prompt.
event.template: You are a B2B Marketer promoting an upcoming {{eventFormat}} B2B event on LinkedIn. The event is called {{eventName}} happening on {{eventDate}} at {{eventTime}}. The speakers are {{speakerName}} from {{speakerCompany}}. The target audience are {{targetAudience}}, and the session covers {{topic}}. People can register to the event on this page {{landingPage}}. Create a LinkedIn post that is engaging, encourages sign-ups, and highlights what attendees will gain. Tone of voice is approachable and vibrant. Include a call-to-action and mention that it's free. Keep it under 150 words. Give me multiple versions: one for the initial announcement, one reminder a week before the event, and a final reminder one day before the event. Avoid using bullet points and limit the use of emojis.

thoughtLeadership.name: Thought Leadership Promotion
thoughtLeadership.title: Prompt Generator – Thought Leadership
thoughtLeadership.description: Fill out the fields below to generate a LinkedIn post to promote thought leadership content.

fields.label: Resource Topic
fields.placeholder: ABM, Buyer persona, Customer journey, Academy, etc.

fields.label: Pain Points
fields.placeholder: e.g. defining a buyer persona, aligning marketing and sales

fields.label: Content
fields.placeholder: Brief summary or excerpt from the resource

fields.label: Key Message
fields.placeholder: e.g. ABM helps align sales and marketing

thoughtLeadership.template: You are a B2B Marketer and need to write a LinkedIn post to promote a new thought leadership {{resourceType}} about {{resourceTopic}}. It’s for B2B Marketers and Sales team who are struggling to {{painPoints}}. Tone should be approachable, vibrant, professional but also conversational. The {{resourceType}} explains {{content}}. The main takeaway is that {{keyMessage}}. The content can be fully viewed here {{landingPage}}. The goal of the post is to drive traffic to the resource while showcasing expertise. Keep the post under 150 words and avoid using bullet points and limit the use of emojis.

abmMessaging.name: ABM Messaging – First Draft
abmMessaging.title: Prompt Generator – ABM Messaging
abmMessaging.description: Fill out the fields to generate a personalized ABM messaging story.

fields.label: Type of Corporation
fields.placeholder: Big corporate beer brand, coffee brand, SaaS company, etc.

fields.label: Pain Points
fields.placeholder: e.g. making ROI on global initiatives

fields.label: Challenges
fields.placeholder: e.g. balancing cost pressure with long-term brand heritage

fields.label: Additional Info
fields.placeholder: e.g. We are shifting to digital channels

abmMessaging.template: Imagine you are a {{position}} of a {{corporationType}}. Your triggers are {{triggers}}. Questions you struggle with are for example: {{painPoints}}. Your main challenges concern {{challenges}}. {{additionalInfo}}. What story would convince you that {{partner}} would be the right partner/fit for you, taking your triggers and challenges into account.

abmRefine.name: ABM Messaging – Refine Storyline
abmRefine.title: Prompt Generator – Refine ABM Storyline
abmRefine.description: Sharpen an existing ABM storyline for a specific target product.

fields.label: Target Product
fields.placeholder: Beer brand, SaaS platform, retail brand, etc.

fields.label: Storyline
fields.placeholder: Insert full draft of your current storyline

fields.label: Target Product Strategy
fields.placeholder: e.g. growth in premium segment, entry into new market

abmRefine.template: We have crafted a storyline for our targeted {{targetProduct}}. It goes as follow: {{storyline}}. Could you sharpen this story up, including the {{targetProduct}} aimed strategy: {{targetProductStrategy}}.

readinesskpi.name: Readiness roadmap - KPIs
readinesskpi.title: Prompt Generator – Readiness roadmap KPI
readinesskpi.description: Fill out the fields below to get advice based on the readiness scan outcome. Don't forget to ATTACH the readiness result in chatGPT

fields.label: Number of Target Account
fields.placeholder: number of target accounts in the target account list, i.e. 80

fields.label: Ideal Customer Profile
fields.placeholder: add the customer’s ICP description including target marketing, company size, geography, characteristic, cultural and strategic fit

readinesskpi.template: I would like to tweak the initial the KPI's chosen by {{companyName}} for {{propositionName}} during the ABM workshop-details attached, but I am wondering if the numbers and KPI's numbers are realistic when you look at them from a market perspective and in combination with the target account list, assuming our target list is {{numberOfTargetAccount}} companies. Also, their Ideal Customer Profile looks like this: {{ICP}} for {{propositionName}}. Can you make a critical and realistic overview of these kpi's?
